title: 128: Tel Aviv: The Search for Real Hummus
itunes:title: 128: Tel Aviv: The Search for Real Hummus
itunes:subtitle: We travel to Tel Aviv to celebrate hummus, plus Cherry Bombe's Kerry Diamond, Tartine's Liz Pruitt, and wine expert Stephen Meuse explains the cru wine system.
description:
We travel to Tel Aviv to celebrate hummus, plus Cherry Bombe’s Kerry Diamond, Tartine’s Liz Pruitt, and wine expert Stephen Meuse explains the cru wine system.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
